group_1.textLeft: …So why don't you come to the beach with us?
Toyo really wants to go.

group_1.textRight: …I'm sorry, but now isn't a good time.

group_1.textLeft: Like I mentioned, if this is about the crops,@then shouldn't you look at multiple places?
Or…is it because of Kuna?@Surely together we can—

group_1.textRight: It's not only that…@I have a role to play here.

group_1.textLeft: ...Like performing prayers?

group_1.textRight: The true path of the Spirit Arts is not to rely@on divine power, but to utilize our knowledge.
The people's livelihoods are supported@as a matter of course.
I read the situation, set policies for the land,@and then convey them as divine will…
That, too, is my role.
Though these days my brother keeps@interfering with me...

group_1.textLeft: Oh… I see.

group_1.textRight: Is it different in The Future?

group_1.textLeft: The future? What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: …I don't know the context for this back and@forth, so this is pure conjecture, but…
I believe you claimed you were from a country@called "The Future" to obscure your identities.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, uh, yeah!@Yes, that's right.
Thank goodness… If it weren't for Nemu,@I'd have dug myself into an even deeper hole…
[chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, is that you, Nemu?!

group_1.textRight: I seem to have transferred from one owner@to another. Presently I'm with Himiko.
In any case, I'm glad to see you again.

group_1.textLeft: Seriously?!@Are you okay?

group_1.textRight: I'm just fine…@More importantly…
U-um… Rena?
You should have used telepathy.

group_1.textLeft: Oh no…

group_1.textRight: …I see… in The Future it must be normal@to suddenly shout out loud.
Is it also customary to mumble@to yourself there?
That excuse falls well below failing marks,@if you ask me.

group_1.textLeft: Shut up… I couldn't think of anything else!

group_1.textRight: Oh, more mumbling…
No… I should respect the customs of foreign@lands, even if I don't understand them.

group_1.textLeft: You have a good attitude!
...I mean…@[chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100901:cheek_1][chara:100901:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]Th-thank you.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* What a funny girl you are.

group_1.textLeft: Don't treat me like a kid.

group_1.textRight: From my point of view, you're still a child...
…Please be good friends with Toyo, okay?

group_1.textLeft: You should try that yourself first before@asking me!
You keep talking about roles and all that.
But really, you just think you can't play@a perfect mother right now, don't you?

group_1.textRight: That's…

group_1.textLeft: Children can't bear it when their parents@are so uptight around them.

group_1.textRight: ...Then what should I do?

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you just do things normally?

group_1.textRight: Normally…?

group_1.textLeft: Having ordinary conversations…@Going to the beach together…
It doesn't need to be anything special.
Well, if you're so worried about the country,@you don't have to come along.
You can keep cultivating Yamatai while avoiding@your duties as a mother.
If that's what you think, then…

group_1.textRight: …I'm…
